Pre-Game Insights: Ghana are yet to register a victory in this qualifying campaign, while Sudan are seeking to rebound from defeat in their last match.
Sudan had won two straight matches on the road – against South Sudan and Mauritania in the World Cup qualifiers – prior to the defeat against Angola in their last match.
Others: This match is a 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifying match.
The match will take place at the Accra Sports Stadium.
The article mentions that Ghana is unbeaten at home against Sudan, recording four wins and a draw in five such games.
